abstract: Senators John McCain of Arizona;, Lindsey Graham of South Carolina and Amy Klobuchar of Minnesota travel to Estonia to reassure Baltic nations that United States is committed to their defense and to NATO alliance, despite comments made by Pres-elect Donald Trump during his campaign.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Senators Reassure Baltics of NATO Commitment
headline.main: Senators Reassure Wary Baltic Nations That U.S. Won’t Abandon NATO

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

snippet: The three Baltic nations, all members of NATO and fearful of Russia, were alarmed by Donald J. Trump’s criticisms of the military alliance....
lead_paragraph: The three Baltic nations, all members of NATO and fearful of Russia, were alarmed by Donald J. Trump’s criticisms of the military alliance.
